title: Reading
teaser: Learning to read is critical step in a child’s elementary school education. But to actually understand what they read on […]
description: Learning to read is critical step in a child’s elementary school education. But to actually understand what they read on […]
contentencoded:
Learning to read is critical step in a child’s elementary school education. But to actually understand what they read on the page requires more than just a basic ability to string letters and words together.


Guest: Daniel Willingham, Professor of Psychology at the University of Virginia.
